name: IRCng
tagline: I'll have my IRC with a flake of JSON, thanks.
body:
What is IRCng?
====

Let us make it clear what IRCng is.
IRCng is a proposal that JSON be used for future implementations of an Internet relay chat system.
The reference implementation, CaffeineIRCd, is written in PHP. It has minimal compatibility with the IRCv(2.7-3.0) protocols, in the form of use of a PROTOCTL command to enable the new (JSON-formatted) protocol.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
